title: Introducing: Bedouin
body:
Photo by [Tom Salvaggio](https://www.

facebook.com/tom.salvaggio) Hailing from LA’s musically prestigious Echo Park, **Bedouin** may well be one of the voices of the year. With her dreamy tones combining the elegance of Laura Marling, and the story-telling prowess of Cat Power, the two tracks sitting on her [Soundcloud](https://soundcloud.com/bedouinmusic) are sparkling gems just waiting to reach a larger audience. Check out both below, and a video for _Bright Lights_.

With her dreamy tones combining the elegance of Laura Marling, and the story-telling prowess of Cat Power, the two tracks sitting on her Soundcloud are sparkling gems just waiting to reach a larger audience. \[…\]
